Name: Kátia Otacílio Vilela
Description:
Kátia was a bar owner. She was stabbed 14 times in her own bar.

Diario da Manha, 11.01.2009, Gazeta Popula 09.01.2009

Name: Mhtium Abululak
Description: Mhtium was stabbed and shot in the head.

Name: Alexa Rojas Castro
Description:
Alexa's body was found half naked in the street. She had been stabbed 12 times and her face mutilated.

Source: La I Saltillo-Noticias, 07.01.2009 & http://trans.ilga.org/ and www.liminalis.de

Name: Marcela Cairo Souza
Description:
Marcela worked in the food industry. She was shot in the head in the street.

Source: Diario da Manha, 11.01.2009, Gazeta Popula 09.01.2009 and www.liminalis.de

Name: Cynthia Nicole
Description:
Cynthia was a transgender rights activist. She was shot three times in the chest and once in the head in a drive by shooting.

Human Rights Watch, TGEU-Mailing-List

Name: Aline da Silva Ribeira
Description:
Aline was attacked and killed in her home.

Source: La Tribuna di Treviso (Newspaper) / http://www.Gaynews.it and http://www.gay.tv

Name: “Rovilson” Teixeira
Description:
Rovilson was stabbed 7 times.

Source: Bonde, 19.01.2009 and www.liminalis.org

Name: Minja K.
Description:
Minja was found dead in her apartment by a friend. She had been stabbed twice in the chest.

TGEU-Mailing-List

Name: “Víctor Manuel” Albor Camacho
Description:
Albor was found in the street after being tortured and beaten.

Source: Notie Se, 22.01.2009 and www.liminalis.org

Name: “Juan Carlos” Guillén Bautista
Description:
Guillén was found in the street after being tortured and beaten.

Source: Notie Se, 22.01.2009 and www.liminalis.org

Name: Dayana Nicole Castillo García
TGEU ref: January 22nd 2009, in own beauty salon/Dayana Nicole Castillo García
Description:
Dayana was found dead in her own beauty salon. She had been stabbed 20 times.

Source: www.liminalis.org and Instituto Runa 23.01.2009

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim was an unidentified trans woman of 28 years old. She died of severe head injuries.

Source: www.liminalis.org and El Universo, 23.01.2009

Name: Camila Hernández Nieto
TGEU ref: January 28   2009, in the street/Camila Hernández Nieto
Description:
Camila was found dead in the street. She had been stabbed.
